data.title: Obituaries
data.meta_site_name: Pollock-Randall & Marysville Funeral Homes - Port Huron, MI
data.text:
Elaine L Shirkey

May 2nd, 1951 to August 8th, 2024

Elaine Louise Shirkey, 73, of Kimball Township, died Thursday, August 8, 2024. She was born May 2, 1951 in Port Huron to the late Wilbur and Bernice Smith. She married William Shirkey on August 26, 1978 in Port Huron. Elaine was employed as a Hi… Read More

Debra A Szymanski

November 3rd, 1959 to August 8th, 2024

Debra Ann Szymanski, 64, of Algonac, died Thursday, August 8, 2024. She was born November 3, 1959 in Detroit to the late Lawrence and Carol Dellow. She married Paul Joseph Szymanski on November 15, 1980 in St. Mary Queen of Creation Catholic… Read More

Marilynn N Janiga

September 30th, 1933 to August 8th, 2024

Marilynn Nelles Janiga, 90, of St. Clair, died Thursday, August 8, 2024. She was born September 30, 1933 in Detroit. Marilynn was a lawyer’s assistant for many years. She is survived by two sons, Michael Janiga and Matthew Axford; a… Read More

James R "Wimpy" Gibson

November 27th, 1950 to August 5th, 2024

James Roy “Wimpy” Gibson, 73, of Port Huron, died Monday, August 5, 2024. He was born November 27, 1950 in Croswell to the late Roy and Mary Gibson. He married Penny A. Nichols on June 13, 1998 in Port Huron. James graduated from… Read More

Bonnie S Hunter

January 10th, 1961 to August 5th, 2024

Bonnie Sue Hunter, 63, of Kimball Township, died Monday, August 5, 2024. She was born January 10, 1961 in Port Huron to Gloria and the late Dale Hunter. Bonnie was employed as a computer analyst with Blue Cross Blue Shield. She enjoyed… Read More

Karen L Barr

May 27th, 1963 to August 4th, 2024

Karen Lynn Barr, 61, of Port Huron Township, died Sunday, August 4, 2024. She was born May 27, 1963 in Port Huron to James C. and the late Joan M. Barr. Karen graduated from Marysville High School in 1982. She was employed as a waitress for… Read More

Sharron A Morden

December 24th, 1940 to August 4th, 2024

Sharron Annette Morden, 83, of Fort Gratiot Township, died Saturday, August 3, 2024. She was born December 24, 1940 in Port Huron to the late Orville and Ethel Parrish. Sharron was employed as a registered nurse with a nursing home for many… Read More

Dewey L Jackson

January 22nd, 1929 to August 3rd, 2024

Dewey Lee Jackson, 95, of Memphis, went home to be with the Lord on Saturday, August 3, 2024. He was born January 22, 1929 in Cookeville, Tennessee to the late Ethan “Logan” and Maggie Jackson. He married Ida Chemin on August 8, 1948 in… Read More

Charles R Harneck

June 15th, 1943 to August 3rd, 2024

Charles Ronald Harneck, 81, of Fort Gratiot, went home to be with the Lord on Saturday, August 3, 2024, at Regency on the Lake, where he had resided for the last 3 months. He was born June 15, 1943 in Port Huron to the late William H. and Althea… Read More

Patrick R Schindler

August 12th, 1985 to March 18th, 2024

Patrick Robert Schindler, 38, of Kimball Township, died Monday, March 18, 2024 after a long illness. He was born August 12, 1985 in Port Huron to Daniel and Nancy Schindler. Patrick graduated from Port Huron High School. Most recently he was… Read More

Richard J O'Neil

February 27th, 1953 to July 31st, 2024

Richard John O’Neil, 71, passed away unexpectedly on Wednesday, July 31, 2024 in his hometown of Port Huron, Michigan. Born February 27, 1953 to Bettye and Robert “Lefty” O’Neil, Rick brought joy and laughter to all who knew him. A man… Read More

Charles T McGuire

July 4th, 1945 to July 31st, 2024

Charles Thomas McGuire, 79, of Kimball Township, died Wednesday, July 31, 2024. He was born July 4, 1945 in Detroit to the late Leander and Luella McGuire. Charles enjoyed playing cards, especially euchre. He also loved sports and watching the… Read More

Mark M DeHate

August 1st, 1955 to July 31st, 2024

Mark Michael DeHate, 68, of Riley Township, passed away on Wednesday, July 31, 2024. He was born on August 1, 1955, in Mount Clemens to the late Dayton F. DeHate and Mabel V. Smith. He met and fell in love with Pamela Sue La Belle and the two were… Read More

Dagmar Malstrom

April 18th, 1942 to July 28th, 2024

Dagmar Marie Malstrom, 82, of Canton, died Sunday, July 28, 2024 in Port Huron, Michigan. She was born April 18, 1942 in Detroit to the late Walfred O. and Eleanore M. Erickson. She married Gerald Malstrom on July 1, 1972 in Detroit. He preceded… Read More

Rosemary V "Rose" Hopp

March 2nd, 1935 to July 28th, 2024

Rosemary Veronica “Rose” Hopp, 89, passed away of natural causes at Marwood Manor Nursing and Rehabilitation in Port Huron, Michigan on Sunday, July 28, 2024. Rose was born to John and Veronica (Smith) Gillett on Saturday, March 2, 1935 in Port… Read More

Elizabeth M "Betty" Bolton

September 1st, 1930 to July 27th, 2024

Elizabeth Marie “Betty” (nee McGuckin, formerly Harrington) Bolton, entered Heaven’s paradise to our Lord Jesus Christ and all her loved ones on Saturday, July 27, 2024, at the sweet age of 93. Betty was born on September 1, 1930 in Detroit… Read More

The Reverend Jane E Rathman

May 28th, 1948 to July 27th, 2024

The Reverend Jane Elizabeth Rathman, 76, of Fort Gratiot Township, died Saturday, July 27, 2024. She was born May 28, 1948 in Buffalo, New York to the late Woodrow and Dorothy Rathman. She married The Reverend William Wingrove on December 13, 1974… Read More

William J Groff Sr

September 13th, 1943 to July 26th, 2024

William Joseph James Groff, 80, of Kimball Township, died Friday, July 26, 2024. He was born September 13, 1943 in St. Clair to the late Harvey F. and Frances E. Groff. He married Jean A. Siefert on July 28, 1970. William worked as a union… Read More

Joseph E Burcham

February 22nd, 1961 to July 26th, 2024

Joseph Edward Burcham, 63, of Riley Township, died Friday, July 26, 2024. He was born February 22, 1961 in Royal Oak to Shirley and the late Jose Burcham. Joseph was employed as a truck driver for many years. He was “Uncle Joe” to everyone… Read More

Shawn McIvor

April 21st, 1985 to July 26th, 2024

Shawn Daniel McIvor, 39, of Port Huron, died unexpectedly on Friday, July 26, 2024 from an undiagnosed heart condition. He was born April 21, 1985 in Port Huron. Shawn was a dedicated store manager with Blufox Mobile in Fort Gratiot. He was a… Read More

William Tenniswood

August 13th, 1943 to July 26th, 2024

William J. Tenniswood, 80, of Smiths Creek, passed peacefully Friday, July 26, 2024. He was born August 13, 1943 in Yale to the late Clair and Elizabeth Tenniswood. He married Barbara Hillman on November 28, 1964 in Yale. William grew up in… Read More

Joyce L Foster

April 9th, 1944 to July 26th, 2024

Joyce L. Foster, 80, of Fort Gratiot, went home to be with the Lord on Friday, July 26, 2024. She was born April 9, 1944 in Pontiac to the late Eunice and the Reverend Ira L. Wood. Joyce was employed as a Guidance Counselor with the… Read More

Timothy J White

March 17th, 1943 to July 25th, 2024

Timothy Joseph White, 81, of Port Huron, died Thursday, July 25, 2024. He was born March 17, 1943 in Detroit to the late Clifford and Mercedes White. Tim served in the United States Navy, Navy Reserves and the Coast Guard Reserve. He was… Read More

Shellie A. Andrews

August 15th, 1961 to July 25th, 2024

Shellie Ann Andrews, 62, of Marysville, died unexpectedly after surgery on Thursday, July 25, 2024. She was born August 15, 1961 in St. Clair. Shellie was a jack of all trades. She was employed as a police officer with the City of Detroit and… Read More

Elizabeth A Regan

November 15th, 1941 to July 24th, 2024

Elizabeth E. Regan, 82, of Chesterfield Township, formerly of Port Huron, died Wednesday, July 24, 2024. She was born November 15, 1941 in Ann Arbor. Elizabeth graduated from Our Lady of Mercy in Detroit. She was employed with the St. Clair… Read More

Ronald V Rabidue

December 8th, 1953 to July 23rd, 2024

Ronald Vernon Rabidue, 70, a lifelong resident of Clyde Township, went home to be with the Lord on Tuesday, July 23, 2024. He was born December 8, 1953 in Port Huron to the late Vernon O. and Ruth M. Rabidue. He married Carolyn A. Thompson on… Read More

Erik B "Pach" Parker

October 16th, 1985 to July 23rd, 2024

Erik Brandon “Pach” Parker, 38, of Kimball Township, died Tuesday, July 23, 2024. He was born October 16, 1985 in Port Huron to Hubert Brown and Theresa Parker. Erik’s children were his world and he devoted himself to their success. He was… Read More

Marie A Hauner

October 25th, 1946 to July 21st, 2024

Marie Alice Hauner, 77, of Port Huron, died Sunday, July 21, 2024. She was born October 25, 1946 in Chicago, Illinois to the late Anthony and Laverne Latronico. Marie owned and operated Do Boy Donuts and El Rancho Restaurant and Motel for many… Read More

Theresa F Ritchey

October 4th, 1942 to July 20th, 2024

Theresa Ritchey, 81, of Warren died Wednesday, July 24, 2024. She was born October 4, 1942 in Detroit to the late Andrew and Elizabeth “Betty” Fiedor. She married Donald E. Ritchey September 28, 1968 in Warren and they spent 53 years of… Read More
